post.body:
We're entering dark times my friends! In the meantime, space like this will be our refuge. Do you part! Cut your ties with Google, Microsoft, Apple, Amazon and other big tech monsters! In the coming weeks, I will provide tips for internet freedom. Topics like:

- why you should start using cryptocurrencies NOW!
- how to use cryptocurrencies anonymously
- selecting the best VPN provider
- which web browser you should use
- switch to Linux, ditch Windows
- how to encrypt your laptop
- anonymize you Android phone (as far as it's possible)
- how to receive SMS messages anonymously (for account verifications)
- encrypted cloud services and how to integrate them with your phone
- encrypted email, how to select the best provider

Follow me, introduce yourself! We're here to stay.
